name: hepc_module.nlpql
content:
// Phenotype library name
phenotype " - hepc module" version "1";

// # Referenced libraries #
include ClarityCore version "1.0" called Clarity;

// Termsets

termset mc_sub_mj_terms_terms: [
    "hasish", "thc", "weed", "marijuana", "blunts", "cannabinoids"
];




termset mc_sub_op_mat_terms_terms: [
    "naltrexone", "methadone", "buprenorphine"
];




termset mc_sub_op_rx_terms_terms: [
    "oxymorphone", "vicodin", "oxycodone", "codeine", "avinza", "percocet", "opana", "morphine", "oxycontin", "fentanyl", "hydrocodone", "kadian"
];




termset mc_sub_op_il_terms_terms: [
    "opium", "heroin"
];




termset mc_sub_op_oth_terms_terms: [
    "pcp", "ecstasy", "methamphetamines", "ghb", "cocaine", "inhalants", "drug use", "ketamine", "hallucinogens", "lsd"
];



// Data Entities

define final mc_sub_op_oth:
    Clarity.CQLExecutionTask({
        "task_index": 0,
        cql: """
                
        library Retrieve2 version '1.0'

        using FHIR version '3.0.0'

        include FHIRHelpers version '3.0.0' called FHIRHelpers

        codesystem "LOINC": 'http://loinc.org'
        codesystem "SNOMED": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.96'
        codesystem "RxNorm": 'http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm'
        codesystem "CPT": 'http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt'
        codesystem "ICD9": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.42'
        codesystem "ICD10": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.3'
        codesystem USCoreEthnicitySystem: '2.16.840.1.113883.6.238' 
        codesystem RelationshipType: '2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.3.449'

        
        

        context Patient

  


        define "mc_sub_op_oth_concepts": Concept {
            Code '3397-7' from "LOINC", 
            Code '3377-9' from "LOINC"
        }




       define "mc_sub_op_oth": 
            	 [Observation: Code in "mc_sub_op_oth_concepts"]



             """
    });



define final mc_sub_op_oth_terms:
    Clarity.ProviderAssertion({
      termset: [mc_sub_op_oth_terms_terms]
    });
                    



define final mc_sub_op_il_terms:
    Clarity.ProviderAssertion({
      termset: [mc_sub_op_il_terms_terms]
    });
                    



define final mc_sub_op_rx_terms:
    Clarity.ProviderAssertion({
      termset: [mc_sub_op_rx_terms_terms]
    });
                    



define final mc_sub_op_mat_loinc:
    Clarity.CQLExecutionTask({
        "task_index": 0,
        cql: """
                
        library Retrieve2 version '1.0'

        using FHIR version '3.0.0'

        include FHIRHelpers version '3.0.0' called FHIRHelpers

        codesystem "LOINC": 'http://loinc.org'
        codesystem "SNOMED": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.96'
        codesystem "RxNorm": 'http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm'
        codesystem "CPT": 'http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt'
        codesystem "ICD9": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.42'
        codesystem "ICD10": '2.16.840.1.113883.6.3'
        codesystem USCoreEthnicitySystem: '2.16.840.1.113883.6.238' 
        codesystem RelationshipType: '2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.3.449'

        
        

        context Patient

  


        define "mc_sub_op_mat_loinc_concepts": Concept {
            Code '3773-9' from "LOINC"
        }




       define "mc_sub_op_mat_loinc": 
            	 [Observation: Code in "mc_sub_op_mat_loinc_concepts"]



             """
    });



define final mc_sub_op_mat_terms:
    Clarity.ProviderAssertion({
      termset: [mc_sub_op_mat_terms_terms]
    });
                    



define final mc_sub_mj_terms:
    Clarity.ProviderAssertion({
      termset: [mc_sub_mj_terms_terms]
    });
